title: Dis ranked system though.
body:
Proof on stream if you don't believe me. Also look at all 10 ranked matches ->  http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=xssijx 
http://www.twitch.tv/deadlystyx/profile/past_broadcasts

But if the your rank is only based off of win/loss please tell me how me and a friend were both smurfing on completely fresh accounts, we played all 10 together. I get s4 and he gets b1. makes sense.

https://i.imgflip.com/k2oz7.jpg

replies.body:
Well, IIRC it's not entirely based on win/lose this year, it balances last years elo against some arbitrary number, then factors in your win/loss. and I think fresh accounts are just set at that arbitrary number.

It IS weird, however, that two fresh accounts would get sorted into different divisions entirely if they played all 10 games together. :/ 
I did all 10 with my league buddy who I usually duo with and he got silver 2 and I got silver 5, but I just thought that was because I did my prelims last season and he didn't.
Yea see you played last season, both our accounts are fresh.
Honestly you scumbags deserve it for smurfing in the first place.
Lol - but youre missing the point, now we are in the elo where we can wreck people and its unfair. Would you not rather our smurfs get placed higher where we belong?

I don't know the main reason but my guess is your normals could have effected the result. If one of the accounts was better at normals before doing ranked, even though you get the same w/l , you might  have placed in different divisions. It would be a great experiment to go w/ a friend and level up to 30 from 1 only and only playing w/ him. So you will have the same w/l ratio. It would really be very interesting but probably very time consuming experiment.
adds a comment to the list so the post is placed higher, and gets more views.

As far as the differing placements it would almost have to be based on MMR, which to my knowledge is not known how to calculate it, but it does not entirely base off W/L so it is possible you had a higher MMR than your friend even though you played together all 10 games, factoring in you playing better in certain games having better stats all that cool shit that we don't know about
